description: Moments helps you to deepen your personal and professional relationships by helping you to be thoughtful at the right moments in a personal way.
title: Moments â€” A Personal Relationship Manager
introduction: Moments is a Personal Relationship Manager designed to help you stay in touch with the people that matter in your personal and professional life. It assists in deepening relationships by helping you be thoughtful at the right moments in a personal way.
features: Social To-Dos: Preview upcoming events and reminders to reduce daily cognitive load and stress.
Social Circles: Assort contacts into different groups and levels of importance.
Events and Reminders: Create events for contacts and get reminders for various related tasks.
Social Feed: One feed containing social updates and activity data from CRM contacts.
Learn: Articles and courses to boost social skills.
AI Composer: Compose personalized messages and emails tailored to each contact.
targetPeople: Individuals looking to manage and strengthen their personal and professional relationships.
